trans-unit.source: Contains fields that can be used to pass event delegates to a thread-safe <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize*> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: Contém campos que podem ser usados para passar delegados de eventos para um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize*>método de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize*> do thread-safe

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que representa o método que manipula o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>evento.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeEventHandler"></xref> that points to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeEventHandler"> </xref> que aponta para o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que representa o método que manipula o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement>evento.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementEventHandler"></xref> that points to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementEventHandler"> </xref> que aponta para o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que representa o método que manipula o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode>evento.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventHandler"></xref> that points to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventHandler"> </xref> que aponta para o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que representa o método que manipula o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>evento.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventHandler"></xref> that points to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventHandler"> </xref> que aponta para o manipulador de eventos.
